attributes.action: create a system where single and childless people are not subsidizing families, students and pensioners..
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: those of us who struggle to get by on our own seem to be hit hardest with no help, instead quite the opposite. is it not time that people paid for what the use.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
